question: The World Lab Animal Day (WLAD) is observed on which day?
explanation: The World Day For Animals In Laboratories (also known as World Lab Animal Day (WLAD)) is observed every year on April 24 to mark the birthday of former  National Anti-Vivisection Society (NAVS) president Hugh Dowding, Today the event is marked by demonstrations and protests by groups opposed to the use of animals in research. NAVS and other groups opposed to animal research have claimed that the WLAD is recognized by the United Nations. However, the day is not included on the official list of United Nations observances.
